attributes.action: Call on the Tories to comment on its spin doctor Andy Coulson's bulling conduct as editor of the News of the World
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Tories have failed to respond to the findings of the Stratford Employment Tribunal in Dec 2008 that its director of communications, Andy Coulson, presided over a culture of bullying as editor of the News of the World.
